name: Baseball Game HomeRun
description:
Enjoy the best baseball game home run experience on your mobile. Let’s play real awesome free and most addictive & accurate baseball home run game, Baseball Game HomeRun 3D is a game with enhanced batting & bowling controls & realistic game play. With Baseball Game HomeRun 3D player will experience the real feel of baseball match.
Baseball Game HomeRun 3D has perfectly tuned touch control to give the ultimate baseball experience to the player. Grow your skills with Baseball Game HomeRun 3D from initial rookie to Major League player. Make expert yourself with powerful home run hits and become a legend of home run in this best ever Baseball Game HomeRun 3D sports simulator.
Swipe to swing the bat and watch ball fly out of the park for HomeRun! Player will experience the intuitive baseball like never before.
Simple and more realistic baseball homerun game. Perfectly touch control to give the conclusive baseball home run experience to the baseball home run game player.

Game Features: High quality realistic animations, great ball physics for the various types of pitches.

Multiple fascinating players included in this game & real stadium crowd

Game Modes:

- Match
- Batting
- Bowling

Game Features:
- Always handy: 6 innings in match mode
- Perfect physics that makes your home run correct direction
- Awesome game play
- 3 best interesting modes
- Highly Addictive Sport Simulator
- Simple controls
- Best graphics and music

How to Play:

Batting Mode:: Swipe to hit the ball accurately and smash it hard to score home run. After miss 3 balls inning is over.

Bowling Mode:: To defeated your opponent tap the Ball Button at accurate time when needle is in center of speedometer. After opponent miss 3 balls inning is over.

Swing your bat fast and accurately to hit more home run for maximum score.

Ball with maximum speed to freeze your opponent in minimum score.
